import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Giftcard from '../Giftcard'; require('./styles.css') const Sidebar = ({ phone }) => { const daysCollections = { closeDays: [{ day: "Dic. 16,2023", hour: "15:00 - 17:00" }], days: [ { day: "Lunes", hour: "09:00 - 18:00" }, { day: "Martes", hour: "09:00 - 18:00" }, { day: "Miercoles", hour: "09:00 - 18:00" }, { day: "Jueves", hour: "09:00 - 18:00" }, { day: "Viernes", hour: "09:00 - 18:00" }, { day: "Sabado", hour: "Cerrado" }, { day: "Domingo", hour: "Cerrado" }, ] } return (

QUIENES SOMOS

Hair Units Installations - Hair Replacement Services - Non Surgical - Wig Shop Barbering Services

HORARIO DE APERTURA Y CONTACTO

{phone}

{daysCollections.days.map((dayObject) => (
{dayObject.day} {dayObject.hour}
))}
{daysCollections.closeDays.map((dayObject) => (
{dayObject.day} {dayObject.hour}
))}
); } export default Sidebar;
